Question: In the summer of the 1979 energy crisis, this person held a two-day boycott of Shell Oil Company which attracted media attention.
Hints: This person was hired with no change in salary and a more intense schedule.
Originally set for a 2000 release, this person starred as Orinthal, a family dog.
In June 1969, the family moved to nearby Rockville Centre and this person transferred to South Side High School.
